system.description: When you infiltrate other factions to spread false information, steal secrets, or hide your actions, roll +Sleight.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your deception is discovered. You're exposed, your agents are compromised, or your true intentions are revealed to your enemies.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: Your subterfuge succeeds, but choose one: you leave traces that could be followed back to you, you only achieve part of your goal, or you have to sacrifice something valuable to maintain your cover.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your deception works perfectly. You achieve your goal without detection and may gain additional intelligence or advantages.
